Html: Good day! I'm plotting a dynamic exchange real-time charts. In particular "candelstick chart". I use a marker's class inherited from ShapePointMarker, as the data source used EnumerableDataSource<T>. The problem is that the Render method is called only when the new item adds to collection .. When there is a change of item's properties (for example, candlestick charts - is changing the closing price, the high or low), this method is not called. So the candle on candelstick graphs generated within the specified timeframes, and I need to see the process of the formation of this candle. What to do?

Hi

EnumarableDataSource<T> has an event called RaiseDataChanged();
I am not sure whether you are looking for this or some sort of conversion based on limit changes. For limit changes check this=> SetYMapping(....).

Regards
Ravi/
